Uses of Class
org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase.MinkowskiSum.Point

  • Packages that use MinkowskiSum.Point 
    Package Description
    org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase
    Sub package of the Collision package handling narrow-phase collision detection.

    • Uses of MinkowskiSum.Point in org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase

      Methods in org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase with parameters of type MinkowskiSum.Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void Gjk.findClosestPoints(MinkowskiSum.Point a, MinkowskiSum.Point b, Separation s)
      Finds the closest points on A and B given the termination simplex and places them into point1 and point2 of the given Separation object.
      void MinkowskiSum.Point.set(MinkowskiSum.Point p)
      Copies the values of the given point to this point.
      void MinkowskiSum.support(Vector2 direction, MinkowskiSum.Point p)
      Returns the farthest point in the Minkowski sum given the direction in the given MinkowskiSum.Point object.
